name: Basic Candlestick Chart
description: OHLC Candlestick chart for financial or aggregated time series data. Supports optional Moving Average overlay.

form.description: Leave empty for auto (uses series color)
Format: D=day, DD=day(2), MMM=month, MM=month(2), YYYY=year, YY=year(2)
Maximum number of data points to fetch (default: 100000)
